And iso means...??? Exactly what?
iso is a virtual CD/DVD
Great game! Works perfectly.

What am i supposed to do with the file? It doesn't work properly with anything for me :-s
I'm sure it's my fault though ;-)

hehe ye it is probably, first you have to extract it. maybe you have winrar on your pc or otherwise look on google. 
After you extract it u get another file, anno 1701.iso or something like that. For this file you need daemon tools or poweriso. Here you can download Daemon Tools: 
http://www.disc-tools.com/request?p=e4c68ae7fc7c2521c3453835b96855d9/daemon4112-lite.exe
If you installed daemon tools and restarted your pc you got a new icon in your toolbar, a red lightning right click > virtual cd/dvd > Device 0 >  Mount image > then select anno 1701.iso
Your pc now thinks there is a DVD in your pc that's why it's called virtual dvd ;-) You can now just install the game... Good luck with it! You can always post more questions ;-)

Hey, Great job, thanks for making it simple, but me being computer illiterate i still managed to miss part, and i really want to play this game lol, ok, i downloaded the torrent, extracted the rar, mounted it onto daemon, got it all installed just fine
BUT now when i try to start it, its asking me to insert the original cd into the computer, what am i missing? thanks

You didn't replace the exe, it's on your virtual dvd or you can download it here: 
http://gbw.naxphost3.com/files/Anno1701v1.0NoDVDFixedexeGer.rar
If you downloaded it, extract it. Then you got something like anno1701.exe or 1701, not really sure but just drop that file in your anno dir (C:\program Files\anno 1701\ = standard) it asks to replace it and accept it, good luck!
